Class ConnectionController

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionController

        public ConnectionController(CommandController controller)
                     throws MissingArgumentException,
                            java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Create connection controller for connect to server
        Parameters:
        controller - current program controller
        Throws:
        MissingArgumentException - if config file haven't got address and port
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if config file not found

    • Method Detail

      • readConfig

        private void readConfig()
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        MissingArgumentException
        Read config file with "config.excalibbur". File need to have "port: *digits*" and "address: *IP address/domain*"
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file not found
        MissingArgumentException - if port or address not found in file

      • openChannel

        public void openChannel()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Close current channel and open new
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if new channel can't open or old can't close

                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Wait on channels for new data
        Returns:
        object with data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if object couldn't receive
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if object couldn't deserialize
